descriptionHtml:
This is the character that I most of the time play as. The face is somewhat dear to me....I cant get away from it no matter how many times I try to make a new face. It doesn't even make it any better that the face uses the basic sliders of character creation that I do not know why i like it so much. But... I do and I hope you guys come to like her too :)
The name Sharliah came about from my love of Karliah (my favorite skyrim character) >_< You cna always change the name though !

This is a save file and a preset file (and knowing most people on this site...most likely already know what to do with it)
But for those who don't, here is how to do it:
1. The save file will have an end called .ess ...place that file into your skyrim saved game folder..in mine its my documents/my games/skyrim/saves
2. the Chargen folder goes into your skse folder (you must have skse for a lot of things)
And that is all there is to know

To get the look of her right, you should have:
1. UNP/UNPB/SEVENBASE body mods (idk if she will look the same on cbbe but you can try)
2. any skeleton mod that supports bbp if you are using bbp (shes just a face and a body) / make sure to have FNIS too
3. numenume elf ear by [b]numenume I use this for the elf ears :)
[/b]4. i made the face before installing race menu but since I made it into a preset in race menu, race menu is needed ! for the preset :)
5. Alternate start is needed since the save file starts you inside the alternate start room
6. Any texture works with this face however, to make her look like mine or in my pictures, you have to use:
Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase - WIP by [b]Zonzai and Seren4XX
[/b]7.The Eyes Of Beauty by [b]Gabriel Mailhot (but you dont need it...its just for nicer looking eyes :) )
[/b]That I believe is all that is needed for the save to work :)

All credits go to the mod authors of all the mods I used for this character :) without them I wouldn't bee able to make her >_<
author: SNSDLOVER
